content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Lab at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position (0, 0)) with input for automation science pack and currently no power.

#### Stone furnace at position (4, -63)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (4, -63)) with fuel (coal) and currently no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. In this case, the small electric pole could not be placed at (-1, 0) because something was in the way. Always check the surrounding area for obstructions before placing structures.
